script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

--we use the seeting name as id so we dont have to fetch the measure again in code CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_g_settings_available_measures AS select measurename as id ,measurename as value from amp_features_visibility fv ,amp_features_templates ft ,amp_measures m where ft.feature=fv.id and parent =(select id from amp_modules_visibility where name ='Measures') and ft.template = (select CAST ( settingsvalue AS bigint )from amp_global_settings where settingsname ='Visibility Template') and fv.name=m.measurename and type in ('D','A') order by measurename asc;
